cx-header-progressbar-text: Text to be shown with the progress bar in [[Special:ContentTranslation]]. $1 is translation progress in percentage.
cx-source-view-page:
A link that points to the source page under the heading of the source article.

Parameters:
* $1 - the source article title
cx-publish-page:
Link of the page to be publish. Parameters:
* $1 - URL
* $2 - link text
cx-publish-page-error: Error message to display when page saving fails.
cx-publish-button:
Publish button text in [[Special:ContentTranslation]].

Also used in {{msg-mw|Cx-tools-instructions-text6}}.
cx-publish-summary:
Edit summary when creating the translated page.

This is an automatic edit summary for the page that is automatically created as a result of translating a message using something like [[Special:Translate]].

Parameters:
* $1 - the source page name
tag-contenttranslation: A short description of the contenttranslation tag. Appears in the edit summary when a translated page is created.
cx-source-loading:
Status text shown in the source article pane while article is being loaded.

Parameters:
* $1 - the title of the page being loaded
cx-redlink-title: Tooltip for a red link that appears in the interlanguage links list and invites the user to translate the article to their language. $1 is the language name in the interface language.
cx-special-login-error: Error to show when user try to use [[Special:ContentTranslation]] without logging in.
cx-tools-instructions-title: Title for the translation tools pane.
cx-tools-instructions-text1: Help text for the translation tools pane.
cx-tools-instructions-text2: Help text for the translation tools pane.
cx-tools-instructions-text3: Help text for the translation tools pane.
cx-tools-instructions-text4: Help text for the translation tools pane.
cx-tools-instructions-text5: Help text for the translation tools pane.
cx-tools-instructions-text6:
Help text for the translation tools pane.

Refers to {{msg-mw|Cx-publish-button}}.
cx-tools-searchbox-text: Placeholder text for the searchbox on the translation tools column
cx-tools-view-guidelines:
Parameters:
* $1 - the URL pointing to the guidelines for translation in Wikipedia
